Verses: 1 paarvon Kaadhsaavai Azhikkumunne, Pelistharukku Virodhamaaith Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Eremiyaavukku Undaana Karththarudaiya Vasanam:

2 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Vadakkeyirundhu Jalam Pongi Pravaagamaagi Dhesaththinmelum, Adhilulla Ellaavatrin Melum, Nagaraththinmelum, Adhil Kudiyirukkiravargalin Melum Purandu Odum; Appozhudhu Manushar Kookkuralittu, Dhesaththin Kudigalellaarum Alaruvaargal.

3 avargaludaiya Balaththa Kudhiraigaludaiya Kulambugalin Saththaththaiyum, Avargaludaiya Radhangalin Kadakadappaiyum, Avargaludaiya Urulaigalin Iraichchalaiyum Kettu, Thagappanmaar Thangal Kai Ayarndhuponadhinaal Thangal Pillaigalaiyum Nokkip Paaraadhiruppaargal.

4 pelistharaiyellaam Paazhaakkavum, Theeruvukkum Seedhonukkum Meedhiyaana Sagaayaraiyellaam Sangaarampannavum Varugira Naalile Ippadiyaagum; Kapthor Ennum Kadarkaraiyaana Dhesaththaaril Meedhiyaagiya Pelistharaiyum Karththar Paazhaakkuvaar.
5 kaadhsaa Mottaiyadikkappadum; Avargaludaiya Pallaththaakkile Meedhiyaagiya Askalon Sangaaramaagum; Nee Endhamattundhaan Unnaik Keerikkolluvaai.
6 aa Karththarin Pattayame, Endha Mattum Amaraadhiruppaai? Un Uraikkul Thirumbivandhu, Oindhu Amarndhiru.
7 adhu Eppadi Amarndhirukkum? Askalonukku Virodhamaagavum Kadalthurai Dhesaththukku Virodhamaagavum Karththar Adharkuk Kattalaikoduththu, Avvidangalukkendru Adhaik Kuriththaare.
